The installer will not work. The douche that uploaded this renamed the setup files and they will not work with the setup.exe. Because I'm a stingy bastard and can't be bothered downloading the other one I fixed it myself. First extract the files with 7-Zip, then rename the setup-1.bin files to Mafia2-1.bin, Mafia2-2.bin, etc. You need to download http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3917782/Magic_ISO_Maker_5.4_with_serial from there to be able to repack the ISO. Pretty self-explanatory.
Pistreekeedas, thank you for pointing that out. That was starting to drive me nuts. I managed to decompress it and change the file names, but couldnt remember how to repack as an ISO

No worries ruiner54. Sorry if I sounded a bit grumpy. I just don't like people who upload torrents and then everyone says it works. It took me ages to find out that I needed MagicISO because, although I came across it once in my many internet travels, Google only showed repacking ISO files for PSP which was pretty annoying.
